title: Marketing Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Alpha
Interview Descriptions: very quick interview, with fast talking no talk about benefits or salary,  was told I would find out salary during the second interview if granted one, Frankly it seemed very fishy the interview was way too fast for me and there was about 4 other people interviewing for the same position that day my overall experience was disappointing
Interview Questions: how do I deal with stressful situations?

title: Solutions Architect Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. I interviewed at Alpha in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: One phone interview and then face-to-face interview. On-site interview was group/panel interview. The interviewer was very knowledgable and his objective was primarily to see how I approach a specific problem. It was one of those very rare interviews where interviewee gets to learn.
Interview Questions: Mostly discussion/brainstorming type. E.g. how can we plan for storing data into data lake?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Alpha (New York, NY) in Feb 2016
Interview Descriptions: it basic ask me some question all about the financial services also ask me some thing very professional it cant be tough, what is my dream , my dream is not having the deam

title: Testing Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Alpha (Chennai) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Good interfere pricesand good questions were askd are the interview war every very easu n reflected and studied well and presided well n wen on Wynn and the interviewers were happy withgNew performance and good selected vi the company

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Alpha
Interview Descriptions: Quick phone interview following by on site round. A few technical and a few general questions were asked. A position offered the following week. Each set of people had different questions. Also each person provided insight into the company and their individual roles. They provided details as to previous person in the job. They explained their pain points
Interview Questions: What is an obstacle you have overcome (or failed to overcome) during a project?

title: Analyst Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Alpha (New York, NY) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Had a video interview with nobody on the other side, they asked a few questions that you had 3 seconds to prepare for, i think the point was that they wanted you to be able to think on your feet.

title: Client Services Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Alpha (New York, NY) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: I applied online the application was very short. Then I was asked to answer questions with my computer. The questions and responses were timed to about 30 secs max. Then the HR department reached out to me to do a skype interview through Google hangouts. After that, I was invited to do a case study presentation at the office in NYC.
Interview Questions:
What is your favorite movie?
What other companies are you considering?

title: Co-Op Student Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Alpha in Jan 2010
Interview Descriptions:
called and telephone interview. Ask experiences, past job description, past job experiences. etc 
asked salary expectation, where do you live. what is your career five year plans, what you expect from the company
